attributes.action: do something to prevent the supermarket chain kwiksave from dying
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the government to do something to stop the supermarket chain kwiksave from dying as it is well integrated into communities and offer's better brands at lower prices. kwik save is struggling to stay open and this would mean the closure of aprox 230 shops and at least 2000 jobs in the UK.

reasons: Commercial endorsement, promotion of any product, service or publication, or statements that amount to adverts
